title: My Pixel 3 camera's photographs are always blurred on one side. Tried safe mode but problem remains.
content:
I have tried rebooting in safe mode and cleared the camera app cache but the problem still exist.
The camera will sometimes keep clicking and refocusing when trying to take a photo. Regardless, one side of the photo will become very blurred, on landscape orientation it will either be the left or right edge, top or bottom edge on portrait. 
I have requested for callback support everyday since 2 days ago but nobody has called me at all.
